import MyNavbar from "../../components/MyNavbar/MyNavbar"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { GroupsData } from "../../groupsData"; import { Container, Col, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import Table from "react-bootstrap/Table"; import './Groups.css'; import Footer from "../../components/Footer/Footer"; function Groups() { console.log("groupData", GroupsData); const groupId = useParams().groupId; console.log(groupId); const groupInfo = GroupsData.find((group) => group.id == groupId); console.log(groupInfo.btn); return ( <>

{groupInfo.groupName}

{groupInfo.text}
{groupInfo.teacher}
پایه گذار حیوان رنگ عنصر روح اتاق مشترک
{groupInfo.founder} {groupInfo.animal} {groupInfo.color} {groupInfo.element} {groupInfo.soul} {groupInfo.room}
); } export default Groups;
